OpenBrowser Stress Tests

Testing browser automation, form libraries, and AI agents

Browser Agent Challenge

An interactive evaluation challenge designed to test AI agents' ability to drive a browser like a human using tools like Playwright. Complete 31 tasks including button clicks, drag & drop, CAPTCHA solving, and more.

Take the Challenge

Forms Comparison

Compare 27 different form implementations across various libraries and frameworks. This comprehensive test suite includes everything from vanilla HTML to complex libraries like React Hook Form, with challenging cases for autofill systems.

View Forms

Tap and Hold Captcha

Test your ability to complete a tap and hold captcha verification. This challenge requires precise timing and sustained interaction to verify human behavior through a 3-second hold gesture.

Try Captcha
